channel.title: Markdown on 嵌入式系统 Enthusiast

item.title: Markdown使用技巧
item.description:
001.how to set style patter(color etc.,) in mermaid a. single node setting method&emsp;&emsp;style d fill:#6a0035,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px like the css code above, the "d" node will be set to the following pattern as u said b. multi nodes setting method c --> d{"1st_Key
IMMDeviceEnumerator.
EnumAudioEndpoints()"}:::css_keypoint d --> |"((HRESULT)(hr)) < 0"| e(Release Object of
IMMDeviceEnumerator) e --> z[end] d --> |"((HRESULT)(hr)) >= 0"|f(Return 
IMMDeviceCollection) f --> g("2nd_Key
IMMDeviceCollection.
GetCount()"):::css_keypoint classDef css_keypoint fill:#6a0035,stroke:#333,stroke-width:1px now node "d" & "g" will be set to special css pattern
